alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Dillon; Florence; Marion; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Florence, southern Dillon, southeastern Darlington, northwestern Marion and southeastern Marlboro Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 524 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Latta to near Timmonsville. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Marion, Dillon, Mullins, Timmonsville, Latta, Quinby, Sellers, Fork, Blue Brick, Zion, Mars Bluff, Brownsville, Florence Darlington Technical College Main Campus, New Hope, Effingham, Oak Grove, Francis Marion University, Bingham, and Floydale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 137 and 141. Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 153 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
